items.sentence: Tom has been asking stupid questions all morning.
Tom has been in the hospital since Christmas Eve.
Tom has known Mary ever since they were children.
Tom hesitated for a moment before answering Mary.
They chatted over coffee for more than two hours.
They told us they wanted to call off the mission.
Things have been a little busier than I expected.
It\'s good that we still have Tom working for us.
Mary didn\'t get along well with the other girls.
Tom told me that he thought he couldn\'t do that.
